body.name: Kitsure Shoe Organizer - 8-Tier Large Shoe Rack for Closet Holds Up to 48 Pairs Shoes & Boots, Multipurpose Shoe Shelf with Hook Rack, Stackable Tall Shoe Rack for Entryway, Bedroom, Garage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 29 mins
features: UPGRADE LARGE CAPACITY: With a size of 53"x11.8"x53.5", Kitsure 8-tier shoe rack for entryway can easily hold up to 48 pairs of various shoes. One tier at 13.4" high allows the rack to accommodate boots, shoe boxes, bags, and other larger accessories. In addition, it comes with a sturdy hook rack for hanging keys, umbrellas, handbags, hats, etc.

DURABLE AND STABLE: Kitsure vertical shoe rack is constructed with premium materials to withstand busy daily use. The rust-proof steel rods and durable plastic connectors provide unmatched stability and strength. The non-woven fabric cradles your finest heels gently without sagging or warping. Treat your footwear to a home with Kitsure free-standing shoe rack.

CUSTOMIZABLE DESIGN: Kitsure shoes organizer for closet can be customized according to your family's storage needs. You can split it into two or more smaller racks and place them in different areas of your home, such as the closet or entryway. Kitsure DIY shoe shelf for closet is a great solution to keep your home free from clutter.

VERSATILE STORAGE RACK: Kitsure multi-functional shelf is a great addition to any home. It's a shoe rack, providing a convenient storage solution for your footwear collection. Besides, it's also a storage rack in your bathroom or kitchen, allowing you to keep your essentials in order and within reach. Kitsure black shoe rack gets your home organized effortlessly.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Kitsure user-friendly garage shoe rack is designed for easy installation without any additional tools to set it up. The step-by-step installation manual with all parts numbered ensures you can quickly assemble the adjustable shoe rack. Moreover, the included wooden hammer helps you connect all parts tightly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Heavy-Duty Metal Material made of unique rust-proof coating and durable metal rods to ensure long-term use High-Quality Non-Woven Fabrics waterproof, wear-resistant, easy-to-clean and suitable for heels Sturdy PP Plastic Connectors keep the shoe rack stable without wobbling when in use Multipurpose Hook Rack provides an extra storage space for your keys, bags, umbrellas, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great space saver
reviews.reviewText: The nine-tiered shoe rack exceeded my expectations in terms of both functionality and design. Its sturdy construction provides ample space for organizing a variety of footwear, from sneakers to heels. Assembling the rack was easy - took about 25 minutes. The provided. Instructions were very clear. The sleek and space-saving design makes it a perfect addition to any closet or entryway. Overall, this shoe rack is a practical and stylish solution for keeping my shoe collection well-organized. You can also adjust the tiers to your liking. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Shoe Rack!
reviews.reviewText: So, I got myself this Shoe Rack, and let me tell you, it has changed the way my closet works! This shoe rack is not your average item – it's tall, sturdy, and built to last!The quality is amazing. This thing is rock-solid, tough and reliable. Unlike my other shoe racks from Amazon, this thing does not move around and seems like it'll last for years.I am no handyman, but the instructions were crystal clear, and all the nuts and bolts were in the box.This shoe rack ain't just for your short ankle shoes, it's a boot and shoe sanctuary. My wife's tall boots and fancy heels found a comfy spot.This Shoe Rack is indeed a must have. Sturdy, easy to set up, and it makes my closet look organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product but instructions are sketchy
reviews.reviewText: This shelving system is solid & reasonably priced. Much better quality than similar products. The instructions could have been a bit clearer, tho. Just an extra sentence or 2 to demo how everything snaps together. However, I found it fairly easy to assemble after I re-read instructions a few times. One tip: They provide a little wooden mallet so you can lock each piece in place, as you go along. I hesitated to use it, lest I make a mistake & couldn't easily reassemble something. But that wasn't a prob, and the mallet is helpful for creating a solid unit. Glad I bought this shelping kit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was simple. The finished product resembles the pictures. I am overall pleased with the ease of assembly and number of shoes that it stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my needs and easy to assemble, looks sturdy yet lightweight, I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customizable, sturdy budget shelf. Amazing customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Used these to help turn my closet into a pantry. Much more affordable than wooden, wire, or custom shelves.Customer service: 5 stars, my 1st shipment came with a couple damaged shelf bases and a free 2nd shipment was sent the same day after emailing.Sturdiness: Definitely will hold shoes as is. If you have extra pieces, I suggest placing 2 pipes in the middle of each shelf as pictured. It'll be as sturdy as a wooden shelf. I also mounted to wall using anti-tip brackets and zip ties (not included) and I'm confident it can hold heavier items.Assembly: Took some time, but very simple. Recommend using rubber mallet to speed up.Flexibility: Very customizable in shelf height and width of overall shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shelf shoe, multipurpose rack
reviews.reviewText: As an 81 y/o lady, was a bit intimidating when the package arrived and box so small, with what looked like a zillion pieces. But knew I could figure it our even the diy instructions were not real clear, but im not a quitter. Took me about 3 hrs to assemble, but took multiple breaks to review process. Finished product was exactly what I needed, is very sturdy, strong and great price. Would definitely recommend and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to organize my shoes!
reviews.reviewText: The assembly instructions were clear and easy. Everything was there and the instructions were good. I was surprised that it was up to my chin when it was completely together. I easily fit all of my shoes on this rack with some room for handbags too. It is sturdy and lightweight and a great way to organize. I love this shoe rack.
